parameters.content:
## Webhook Trigger
Could be google form, Zapier, JSON bundle, however you plan on enriching your lead.

## Email Validation
Validates your leads email.
Hunter io API Key to set up.
Visit: https://hunter.io/api-keys

## Validation Check
If valid ‚Üí Enrichment/Scoring
If invalid ‚Üí append to google sheet, alert via Slack Channel

## Enrichment + Scoring
Hunter io domain search for enrichment ‚Üí Custom scoring algo ‚Üí Routing

## Notification 
Append to Google Sheets, Air Table, or any CRM. ‚Üí Alert/notify via Slack alert.

# Lead Enrichment & Notification Automation - Setup Guide 
## Overview
This n8n workflow automatically enriches incoming leads, scores them based on company data and job titles, and routes them to appropriate Google Sheets while sending Slack notifications. It's designed to showcase advanced lead qualification and CRM automation capabilities.
### Workflow Summary
Input: Lead data via webhook (name, email, company, job title, etc.)
Process: Email validation ‚Üí Company enrichment ‚Üí Lead scoring ‚Üí Routing
Output: Categorized leads in Google Sheets + Slack notifications

### Required Services & Setup
Hunter.io API Setup
Purpose: Email validation and company enrichment
Steps:

Go to https://hunter.io/api-keys
Create a free account (50 requests/month) or upgrade for more
Generate a new API key
In n8n: Go to Credentials ‚Üí Add Credential ‚Üí HTTP Query Auth

Name: Hunter.io API
Query Parameter Name: api_key
Query Parameter Value: [YOUR_API_KEY]



2. Google Sheets Setup
Purpose: Lead storage and CRM functionality
Steps:

Create a Google Sheet named "Lead Management Dashboard"
Create these sheets/tabs:

Analytics (main data)
Invalid Leads


Set up columns in Analytics sheet:
Date | Email | Company | Score | Temperature | Action Required | Estimated Deal Value

In n8n: Go to Credentials ‚Üí Add Credential ‚Üí Google Sheets OAuth2 API

Follow OAuth flow to connect your Google account
Grant necessary permissions



3. Slack Integration Setup
Purpose: Real-time lead notifications
Steps:

Go to https://api.slack.com/apps
Create a new Slack app for your workspace
Add these OAuth scopes:

chat:write
channels:read


Install app to workspace and copy the Bot User OAuth Token
Create these Slack channels:

#hotleads
#warmleads
#coldleads
#invalidleads


In n8n: Go to Credentials ‚Üí Add Credential ‚Üí Slack OAuth2 API

Paste your Bot User OAuth Token

### Google Sheets Setup
Purpose: Lead storage and CRM functionality
Steps:

Create a Google Sheet named "Lead Management Dashboard"
Create these sheets/tabs:

Analytics (main data)
Invalid Leads


Set up columns in Analytics sheet:
Date | Email | Company | Score | Temperature | Action Required | Estimated Deal Value

In n8n: Go to Credentials ‚Üí Add Credential ‚Üí Google Sheets OAuth2 API

Follow OAuth flow to connect your Google account
Grant necessary permissions



### Slack Integration Setup
Purpose: Real-time lead notifications
Steps:

Go to https://api.slack.com/apps
Create a new Slack app for your workspace
Add these OAuth scopes:

chat:write
channels:read


Install app to workspace and copy the Bot User OAuth Token
Create these Slack channels:

#hotleads
#warmleads
#coldleads
#invalidleads


In n8n: Go to Credentials ‚Üí Add Credential ‚Üí Slack OAuth2 API

Paste your Bot User OAuth Token
